text: @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden You & Joe are apparently too dense to understand. Why? For the same reason all Americans don't need tested for flu, cancer, STDs etc. 1, no need to test w/o symptoms. 2, you can test negative & still catch Covid19 minutes later. So let's spend tax $ for no value - typ Dem policy!
